Package com.intellij.codeInsight.editorActions

    public interface JoinRawLinesHandlerDelegate

      • Methods inherited from interface com.intellij.codeInsight.editorActions.JoinLinesHandlerDelegate

    • Method Detail

      • tryJoinRawLines

        int tryJoinRawLines(Document document,
                    PsiFile file,
                    int start,
                    int end)
        Tries to join lines at the specified position of the specified file.
        In contrast to tryJoinLines(), this method is called on an unmodified document.

        This joiner is allowed to keep number of lines the same, but it should not increase number of lines in the document.

        It's possible that more than one line-break appears between start and end if several empty lines were selected.

        Parameters:
        document - where the lines are
        file - where the lines are
        start - offset right after the last non-space char of first line;
        end - offset of first non-space char since the next line.
        Returns:
        the position to place the caret after the operation, or -1 if this handler was not able to perform the operation.
